nodes.text: The Mokk Stronghold was a small settlement located in the Mosa Rishin region of the planet Dantooine in which the tribal leader of the Mokk and many other members of the Dantari tribe resided in. The Alliance to Restore the Republic have interacted with the Mokk several times by 1 ABY, presumably also including having access to the stronghold, and was also suspected to be the location where the Rebels made their plans to abduct Doctor Bledsoe, an Imperial scientist. These details acted as the reason why it acted as one of three possible locations of a prison transfer log that Colonel Darkstone dispatched an Imperial unit to retrieve in an attempt to rescue the doctor, the others being the Palace of the Woolamander on Yavin 4 and the Droid Engineer cave on Lok.
The Mokk Stronghold was a location in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011.
